title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses OK after setting the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations. Consequently, setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set the output location.
2. Set the classpath.
3. Press OK to apply the changes.
4. Observe the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
